monsterSenses: Senses blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius)
monsterLanguages: Languages understands Common but can't speak
monsterSpecials: Turn Immunity. The claw is immune to effects that turn undead.
monsterActions: Claw. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning or slashing damage (claw's choice) .
